mlx.nn.Softshrink
*****************

class Softshrink(lambd=0.5)

   Applies the Softshrink function.

   See "softshrink()" for the functional equivalent.

   Parameters:
      **lambd** -- the \lambda value for Softshrink. Default: "0.5"

   -[ Methods ]-

   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
